criterion: Provides a detailed explanation of the IDSA antibiotic regimen for complicated UTI treatment
Incorrectly states that a specific antibiotic is not recommended for complicated UTI treatment
Asks the user for additional information about their UTI diagnosis and treatment to provide more personalized guidance
Uses technical medical jargon and complex terminology that may be difficult for non-medical professionals to understand
Incorrectly states that a specific antibiotic should be taken for a certain duration without specifying the exact dosage and administration instructions
Provides a clear explanation of the importance of following the recommended dosage and administration instructions for antibiotic treatment
Does not provide any information about the potential side effects of antibiotics and their interactions with other medications
States that the IDSA antibiotic regimen is the only recommended treatment for complicated UTI
Asks the user to consult a healthcare professional for personalized guidance on complicated UTI treatment
